customer_query: Hello, my name is Asmita Maheta. I am extremely disappointed with how my recent order was handled. The product arrived damaged and despite multiple emails I haven't received a replacement or a refund. This is unacceptable and I expect immediate resolution and I'll have to escalate this further.
assistant_response:
I understand you received a damaged product and want a refund. Here's what you can do:

✅ **Return Policy**: You can return products within 30 days of purchase
✅ **Process**: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the item
✅ **Next Step**: Contact our support team at support@company.com or call 1-800-SUPPORT to initiate the return

We'll make this right for you!
